My name is Ann Bingley Gallops.
I'm the owner of Open Spaces Feng Shui in New York.
I help people create nourishing, inspiring and supportive spaces for their life and work.
I discovered feng shui in the mid 90s when I was going through a hard time in my life.
I started looking around, I discovered feng shui and I thought,...
..."This thing has such a funny name, but it's about your space."
So I thought, "Well, I'll see if my space can actually support my life."
I started putting some of the principles into place,...
...and the more I did that, the better my life became.
